description.raw:
This fixes running multiple robots using `cloudsim_sim` and `cloudsim_bridge` in catkin workspaces.

To test....

*terminal 1:* `ign launch cloudsim_sim.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG2`

*terminal 2:* `ign launch cloudsim_bridge.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG2`

*terminal 3(using subt_seed)*: `roslaunch subt_seed x1.launch robot_name:=X1`

*terminal 4(using subt_seed)*: `roslaunch subt_seed x1.launch robot_name:=X2`


This is *not* how `cloudsim` runs, but it does allow local testing.
